original_text: He will put his finger in the blood. He must shake it in front of the Lord and the holy curtain seven times.
korean_text: 그 제사장이 손가락으로 그 피를 찍어 여호와 앞, 휘장 앞에 일곱 번 뿌릴 것이며

sentences.original_text: He will put his finger in the blood
He must shake it in front of the Lord
in front of the holy curtain seven times
sentences.korean_translation: 성막 앞에서 일곱 번 흔들어야 합니다
